short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding cleaner experience for the new tab. Currently in Beta version. Please send your feedback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab extension that brings clean and focused outlook for your next page. Completely reimagining what new tab experience should look like. The extension itself is in its early days and will go through changes and obvious improvements. If there is anything that you would like to see in this extension please leave your feedback.
